statements.select: SELECT FACTORY_START_TIME , START_DAY_OF_WEEK , CREATE_TIME , CREATE_USER , UPDATE_TIME , UPDATE_USER FROM CFG_SUPPLY_CHAIN_CONFIG
statements.insert: INSERT INTO CFG_SUPPLY_CHAIN_CONFIG ( FACTORY_START_TIME , START_DAY_OF_WEEK , CREATE_TIME , CREATE_USER , UPDATE_TIME , UPDATE_USER ) VALUES ( #factoryStartTime# , #startDayOfWeek# , #createTime# , #createUser# , #updateTime# , #updateUser# )
statements.update: UPDATE CFG_SUPPLY_CHAIN_CONFIG SET FACTORY_START_TIME = #factoryStartTime# , START_DAY_OF_WEEK = #startDayOfWeek# , UPDATE_TIME = getdate() , UPDATE_USER = #updateUser# WHERE FACTORY_START_TIME = #factoryStartTime#
